original_text:
“This will be the sign for you, Hezekiah:
“This year you will eat what grows by itself,
    and the second year what springs from that.
But in the third year sow and reap,
    plant vineyards and eat their fruit.
korean_text: 또 네게 보일 징조가 이러하니 너희가 금년에는 스스로 자라난 것을 먹고 내년에는 그것에서 난 것을 먹되 제삼년에는 심고 거두며 포도원을 심고 그 열매를 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: This will be the sign for you, Hezekiah:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 네 히스기야를 위한 징조가 되리라

sentences.original_text: This year you will eat what grows by itself,
and the second year what springs from that.
But in the third year sow and reap,
plant vineyards and eat their fruit.
